nodes.text: Jedi Academy: Revenge of the Sis

Jedi Academy: Revenge of the Sis is the seventh volume in the Star Wars: Jedi Academy young-readers series and the first to feature Christina Starspeeder as the protagonist. It was written by Amy Ignatow and published by Scholastic Inc. on March 26, 2019.
An all-new story arc begins in the New York Times bestselling series, with author Amy Ignatow and illustrator Jarret Krosockza in Star Wars: Jedi Academy! Starring Christina Starspeeder!

As told through a mix of comics, doodles, and journal entries, Christina Starspeeder takes us on a new adventure at an all-new Jedi academy campus! There are unfamiliar faces and old ones too, but one thing remains the same: Jedi Academy is full of laughs and warm moments that fans and readers discovering the series for the first time will love.

While past Star Wars: Jedi Academy titles have avoided referencing material specific to the new canon Star Wars continuity, Jedi Academy: Revenge of the Sis features or references many such elements, including porgs, fathiers and Maz Kanata.
